name: Mobileum Inc
goal: Mobileum helps CSPs leverage the power of analytics and big data to deliver monetizable insights that drive business transformation at 650 customers. Mobileum's Wisdom-Action platform powers solutions across domains such as voice and data roaming, IoT/M2M, video, Travel, Counter fraud, network Security, Data abuse, and CEM. Mobileum is based in California's Silicon Valley, with offices across the globe. http://www.mobileum.com
interests: Communication, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Mobileum follows regulatory changes related to Digital Single Market, Roaming Regulation, Net Neutrality, GPDR, ePrivacy, IoT, security, eCall, Reverse 112, 5G, Wifi etc.
